

<h1 align="center">«Improve YouTube!»</h1>
	

<p align="center"><b><code>/ImprovedTube/</code></b> is a lightweight & powerful extension to improve your video experience & choice.</p>

<p align="center">
	<a href="https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/improve-youtube-video-you/bnomihfieiccainjcjblhegjgglakjdd">
	<img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/%20-Chrome-red?logo=googlechrome&logoColor=white">
	</a>
	<a href="https://microsoftedge.microsoft.com/addons/detail/improve-youtube-video-/knbckijjjbmkjiagojjneoplbjilfllc">
	<img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/%20-Edge-blue?logo=microsoftedge&logoColor=white">
	</a>
	<a href="https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/youtube-addon/">
	<img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/%20-Firefox-orange?logo=firefoxbrowser&logoColor=white"></a>
	<a href="https://addons.opera.com/de/extensions/details/improvedtube-youtube-extension/">
	<img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/%20-Opera-red?logo=opera&logoColor=white">
	</a>
	<a href="https://github.com/code-for-charity/YouTube-Extension/wiki/Installation#safari">

</p>

<div align="left" width=50%>
	<h3> <div align="center">The Oldest YouTube Extension </div></h3>
	Since 2012 we have gradually been adding powerful yet lightweight features while maintaining the old ones
	<br>
	Throughout the years we have witnessed the birth and fall of numerous YouTube Extensions such as <a href="https://github.com/YePpHa/YouTubeCenter">YoutubeCenter</a> and <a href="https://github.co/ParticleCore/Iridium">Iridium</a>
	<div>Big thanks ♡ to our <a href="https://github.com/ImprovedTube/ImprovedTube/graphs/contributors">contributors</a>, <a href="https://github.com/code-for-charity/YouTube-Extension#--translators-">translators</a>, and <a href="https://www.blockchain.com/btc/address/144kqL6nGEQtVL3QCdADY4EtduZ95Vu1pL">donators</a> for making this all possible!</div>
</div>



<p align="center"><img width="" alt="YouTube Extension" src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8950185/195243863-57c88d74-04fb-4fb6-8a38-ee1444f2b506.png"></a></p>

<div align="left">
	<h3>Major Features</h3>
	<ul>
		<li>Forced resolution</li>
		<li>Custom playback speed from 0.1-8x</li>
		<li>Youtube Themes</li>
		<li>Video Repeat-, screenshot-, rotate-buttons</li>
		<li>Pop-up player</li>
		<li>Custom hotkeys anshortcuts</li>
	</ul>
	<div align=center><a href="https://github.com/code4charity/YouTube-Extension/wiki/Features">[Full List of Features]</a></div>
<div>

<details>
	<summary align="left"><h2>Development Installation</h2></summary>
	<ol>
		<li>Download & extract the <a href="https://github.com/code4charity/YouTube-Extension/archive/refs/heads/master.zip">latest version 🧪</a> or  <a href="https://github.com/ImprovedTube/ImprovedTube/releases/latest">release</a></li>
		<ul>
			<li><b>Safari</b></li>
			<ol>
				<li>See issue <a href="https://github.com/code4charity/YouTube-Extension/issues/494#issuecomment-675098753">#494</a></li>
			</ol>
			<li><b>Chrome / Brave / Edge / Vivaldi / ...</b></li>
			<ol>
				<li>Go to your Browser’s Extensions page (`chrome://extensions/`)</li>
				<li>Turn on "Developer mode"</li>
				<li>Click the "Load unpacked" button & select the extracted folder</li>
			</ol>
			<li><b>Firefox / LibreWolf / Waterfox / GNUzilla / IceCat / ...</b></li>
			<ol>
				<li>Go to Add-ons (`about:addons`)</li>
				<li>Click on “Extensions” tab</li>
				<li>Click on “Debug Add-ons” (`about:debugging#/runtime/this-firefox`)</li>
				<li>Click on “Load Temporary Add-on…”</li>
				<li>Select the “manifest.json” file from unzipped folder</li>
			</ol>
		</ul>
	</ol>

</details>

<details>
	<summary align="left"><h2>Work to be done</h2></summary>
	<ul>
		<li>Documentation, wiki, screenshots and videos</li>
		<li>Label issues</i>
		<li>🐞 Verify bug reports</i>
	</ul>
</details>

<summary><h3>Our Other Extensions/Projects</h3></summary>
<b>Extensions</b>
<ul>
	<li><a href="https://github.com/victor-savinov/night-mode">Dark Mode</a> - Universal dark-mode!</li>
	<li><a href="https://github.com/victor-savinov/regex-search">Regex Search</a> - Quickly search webpages with regex!</li>
	<li><a href="https://github.com/victor-savinov/frame-by-frame">Frame by Frame</a> - Easily go frame-by-frame on YouTube videos!</li>
	<li><a href="https://github.com/victor-savinov/hid-control-prevention">unFreeze me</a> - Enable Right click, Search, CTRL anyhwere!</li>
	<li><a href="https://github.com/victor-savinov/unblob">unBlob</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://github.com/code4charity/Open-Source-Bot--Github-Git-Pull-Request-Bot">Pull Requests Bot</a> -  Checklists and more in browser!</li>
</ul>
<b>Library</b>
<ul>
	<li><a href="https://github.com/victor-savinov/satus">Satus</a> - Powerful UI Library</li>
</ul>
<b>Other</b>
<ul>
	<li><a href="https://github.com/code4charity/the-RegEx-Collector--Queries--Patterns">RegEX Collector</a> - Collection of RegEX</li>
	<li><a href="https://github.com/code4charity/Open-Source-Bot--Github-Git-Pull-Request-Bot">Pull Request Bot</a> - GitHub bot</li>
</ul>

<div align=center>
	<b>Do you need help running a large extension, site, app or repo? We'd love to help email projects@improvedtube.com for more information!</b>
</div>
